about_the_game:
Embark on a meaningful journey in "Shadow of Eldham," a captivating RPG Maker walking simulator where choices shape destinies. Join Cyneheard and Wystan on their solemn quest to rescue the children of a despised former king in a world haunted by its past.

Set against the backdrop of Eldham, once ruled by a monarch whose legacy is tainted by hatred, players navigate through a world where shadows of the past linger. Cyneheard and Wystan, two unlikely heroes, traverse landscapes where whispers of discontent echo, seeking to redeem their land by attempting to save the innocent offspring of the fallen ruler.

Every choice made reverberates through the lives of NPCs. Will you extend compassion or take a firmer stance? The fate of Eldham's children remains uncertain.

In "Shadow of Eldham," the story lies not in grand battles, but in intimate moments and decisions. Through interactions and choices, players uncover character struggles and forge connections.

Can Cyneheard and Wystan navigate to redemption amidst the echoes of Eldham's troubled past?

content_descriptors.notes: In "Shadows of Eldham," the game deals with mature themes and content. While there's no explicit violence or graphic imagery, the narrative explores complex subjects like loss, and redemption within a dark and atmospheric setting. As players journey through the troubled landscapes of Eldham, they will encounter moral dilemmas, moments of tension, and delve into psychological depth. The narrative may contain mature storytelling elements that provoke thought and emotional engagement, so it's best suited for players comfortable with such themes in their gaming experiences.

name: Shadows of Eldham

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

short_description: "Shadow of Eldham" is an atmospheric narrative walking simulator where players encounter the kingdom's lost children. Explore towns, cities, interact with diverse NPCs, and face moral dilemmas in this captivating journey of redemption, where each step reveals more about the world’s hidden past.
